item.title: Reproducible Shiny App Development with Modules
item.description: Happy New Year to one and all! As data scientists/analysts/researchers/programmers/anything else on that crazy data science Venn diagram, Iâ€™m assuming all of our new years resolutions involve visualising our data with more sophistication and finesse. So with that in mind, I thought it was high time for a post about the joys of modularizing your shiny app code. New Year, new improved workflows with emphasis on efficiency & reproducibility, amiright?
